text: I have resolved on an enterprise that has no precedent and will have no imitator. I want to set before my fellow human beings a man in every way true to nature and that man will be myself.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

text: Nature... is nothing but the inner voice of self-interest.
author: Charles Baudelaire

text: Tears are nature's lotion for the eyes. The eyes see better for being washed by them.
author: Christian Nestell Bovee

text: Nature is a good name for an effect whose cause is God.
author: William Cowper

text: Thus happiness depends, as nature shows, less on exterior things than most suppose.
author: William Cowper
